_comment: Taiwan compliance norms and standards database. Includes BSMI, NCC, CNS standards, TFDA and other Taiwan regulatory requirements. Updated for 2025 compliance requirements.

norms.name: Bureau of Standards, Metrology and Inspection - Commodity Inspection
norms.applies_to: Electrical and electronic products, IT equipment, household appliances
norms.description: Mandatory commodity inspection for products on BSMI list. Registration, Declaration of Conformity, or Type Approval depending on product category. BSMI mark required on product. Covers electronics, IT equipment, household appliances, toys.

norms.name: Registration of Product Certification
norms.description: Most stringent BSMI certification scheme. Factory inspection required. Ongoing surveillance. Third-party testing at BSMI-recognized labs. Applies to products with higher safety risks. RPC certificate and BSMI mark required.

norms.name: Declaration of Conformity
norms.description: Self-declaration scheme. Manufacturer/importer declares compliance with CNS standards. Testing at accredited labs required. No factory inspection. Technical file must be maintained. BSMI mark still required on product.

norms.name: Audio/Video, ICT Equipment - Safety
norms.description: Taiwan adoption of IEC 62368-1. Hazard-based safety standard for ICT equipment. Required for BSMI certification of IT products. Replaces CNS 14336 (IEC 60950-1).

norms.name: Household Appliances - Safety - General Requirements
norms.description: Taiwan adoption of IEC 60335-1. General safety requirements for household appliances. Required for BSMI certification. Part of comprehensive CNS 60335 series.

norms.name: Lithium Batteries - Safety Requirements
norms.description: Taiwan standard for lithium battery safety. Based on IEC 62133. Required for BSMI certification of battery products and power banks.

norms.name: National Communications Commission - Telecom Equipment Type Approval
norms.applies_to: All radio transmitting equipment and telecommunications equipment
norms.description: Mandatory type approval for radio and telecom equipment. Testing at NCC-accredited labs. Type approval certificate and NCC marking required. Covers WiFi, Bluetooth, cellular, all radio devices.

norms.name: Low Power Radio Frequency Equipment Technical Regulations
norms.applies_to: Low power radio equipment (WiFi, Bluetooth, ISM devices)
norms.description: Technical requirements for low power radio devices. Part of NCC type approval. Covers 2.4GHz, 5GHz, and other ISM bands. Power limits, frequency stability, spurious emissions.

norms.name: Specific Absorption Rate Requirements
norms.applies_to: Mobile phones and body-worn wireless devices
norms.description: SAR limit: 2.0 W/kg averaged over 10g of tissue. Testing required for handheld and body-worn devices. Part of NCC type approval. Declaration required.

norms.name: EMC for Information Technology Equipment
norms.description: Taiwan EMC standard for IT equipment. Based on CISPR 22/32. Class A and Class B limits. Required for BSMI EMC compliance.

norms.name: Energy Efficiency Labeling Program
norms.description: Mandatory energy efficiency labeling. 5-grade system (Grade 1 most efficient). Required for products in mandatory category (refrigerators, air conditioners, etc.). BOE (Bureau of Energy) administered.

norms.name: Minimum Energy Performance Standards
norms.description: Mandatory minimum energy efficiency standards. Products must meet MEPS before import or sale. Various standards for different product categories. BOE enforcement.

norms.name: Taiwan Food and Drug Administration - Medical Device Registration
norms.description: Mandatory registration for medical devices. Classification I, II, III based on risk. QMS requirements. Clinical data may be required. Pre-market approval for Classes II and III. Manufacturing license for domestic production.

norms.name: Good Manufacturing Practice for Medical Devices
norms.description: Taiwan GMP requirements for medical devices. Based on ISO 13485. TFDA inspection and certification. Required for device registration and manufacturing license.

norms.name: Vehicle Safety Certification Center - Type Approval
norms.description: Vehicle type approval requirements. Safety standards, emissions. VSCC (under MOTC) conducts testing or recognizes test reports. Based on international standards with Taiwan requirements.

norms.name: Vehicle Emission Standards
norms.description: Vehicle emission limits. Phase 6 and Phase 7 standards (equivalent to Euro 5/6). Type approval testing. EPA Taiwan oversight. OBD requirements.

norms.name: BSMI Toy Safety Certification
norms.description: Mandatory BSMI certification for toys. Safety requirements based on CNS 4797 and ISO 8124. Mechanical, chemical, flammability, electrical hazards. Age grading. Testing at accredited labs.

norms.name: Safety of Toys
norms.description: Taiwan toy safety standard. Based on ISO 8124. Covers mechanical properties, flammability, migration of elements. Used for BSMI toy certification.

norms.name: Restriction of Hazardous Substances
norms.description: Restriction on hazardous substances in EEE. Similar to EU RoHS. Limits for lead, mercury, cadmium, hexavalent chromium, PBBs, PBDEs. Voluntary marking scheme. Increasingly enforced.

norms.name: Waste Management Act - E-Waste Recycling
norms.description: Producer responsibility for e-waste. Recycling fee collection system. Registration and reporting requirements. Four-in-one recycling program. EPA Taiwan enforcement.

norms.name: Recycling Management Fund Fee
norms.applies_to: Products subject to recycling fees (EEE, batteries, vehicles, containers)
norms.description: Mandatory recycling fees for designated products. Fee paid by manufacturers/importers. Supports recycling infrastructure. Different rates for different product categories. EPA collection.

norms.name: Food Sanitation Act - Food Contact Materials
norms.description: Safety requirements for food contact materials. Standards for plastics, metals, ceramics, paper. Migration limits. Positive lists. TFDA enforcement.

norms.name: PDPA - Personal Data Protection
norms.description: Taiwan data protection law. Consent requirements, data subject rights, security measures, breach notification. Similar principles to GDPR. Applies to connected devices and services.

norms.name: Cybersecurity Requirements for Critical Infrastructure
norms.applies_to: Critical infrastructure operators and government systems
norms.description: Cybersecurity requirements for critical infrastructure. Security audits, incident reporting, vulnerability management. Affects network equipment, security products. Evolving requirements.

norms.name: Consumer Protection Act
norms.description: Consumer rights framework. Product safety, information, recalls, liability. Consumer dispute resolution. CPC (Consumer Protection Committee) enforcement. Product testing programs.

norms.name: Product Liability Provisions
norms.description: Strict liability for defective products. No-fault liability under Consumer Protection Act. Manufacturers, importers, sellers can be liable. Product recall authority.

norms.name: Commodity Labeling Requirements
norms.description: Mandatory labeling for commodities. Product name, manufacturer/importer information, country of origin, contents, warnings. Chinese language required. BSMI enforcement.

norms.name: Legal Metrology Requirements
norms.description: Net content declaration requirements. Tolerances. Verification of measuring instruments used in trade. BSMI enforcement and inspection.

norms.name: Taiwan Customs Import Classification
norms.description: HS-based commodity classification. Determines duties, regulatory requirements. Accurate classification required for customs clearance. BSMI, NCC, TFDA clearance for regulated products.

norms.name: Importer Registration Requirements
norms.description: Company registration required for importing. Authorized agent for foreign companies. Responsible for product compliance, certifications, documentation. BSMI/NCC certificate holder registration.

norms.name: Trademark Act - Brand Protection
norms.description: Trademark registration and protection. TIPO (Taiwan Intellectual Property Office) administration. Prevents unauthorized use. Enforcement against counterfeits. Important for brand protection.

norms.name: Patent Act - Innovation Protection
norms.description: Patent protection for inventions, utility models, designs. TIPO registration. Affects product design, technology licensing. 20-year protection for inventions.

norms.name: Toxic and Concerned Chemical Substances Control Act
norms.applies_to: Chemical substances and products containing chemicals
norms.description: Registration and control of toxic chemicals. Notification for new substances. Restrictions on specific chemicals. EPA Taiwan enforcement. Affects product materials and composition.

norms.name: Air Pollution Control - VOC Limits
norms.description: VOC limits for certain products (paints, coatings, adhesives, cleaning products). Environmental protection requirements. EPA enforcement.

norms.name: Taiwan Green Mark Eco-Label
norms.description: Voluntary environmental labeling program. Type I eco-label (ISO 14024). Criteria for various product categories. EPA Taiwan certification. Market preference and government procurement advantage.

norms.name: Energy Star Certification (Taiwan Program)
norms.description: Voluntary energy efficiency certification. Taiwan adaptation of US Energy Star. Market differentiation for efficient products. BOE recognition.

norms.name: Product Carbon Footprint Labeling
norms.description: Voluntary carbon footprint labeling. Quantifies product lifecycle carbon emissions. EPA Taiwan program. Increasing market relevance for sustainability.

norms.name: Occupational Safety and Health Act
norms.description: Workplace safety requirements. Affects machinery, electrical equipment, PPE. MOL (Ministry of Labor) enforcement. Standards for various workplace hazards.

norms.name: Personal Protective Equipment Standards
norms.description: CNS standards for PPE. Safety helmets, gloves, goggles, respirators. BSMI certification for some PPE categories. MOL requirements for workplace use.

norms.name: Building Technical Regulations
norms.description: Building safety and construction standards. Affects electrical systems, fire safety, structural materials. Local government enforcement. Product certifications often required.

norms.name: Fire Services Act - Fire Safety Equipment
norms.applies_to: Fire safety equipment and building fire protection
norms.description: Fire safety requirements for buildings and equipment. Fire detection, suppression, emergency lighting. NFA (National Fire Agency) standards and approval.

norms.name: Pharmaceutical and Cosmetic Regulations
norms.description: Registration and safety requirements for drugs and cosmetics. TFDA pre-market approval. GMP requirements. Labeling and advertising regulations.

norms.name: Health Food Regulation
norms.description: Registration required for health foods (functional foods). Health claim substantiation. TFDA approval. Labeling requirements. Distinguishes from general food and pharmaceutical drugs.

norms.name: Telecommunications Business Law
norms.description: Framework for telecom regulation. NCC authority. Service licensing, technical standards, consumer protection. Affects telecom equipment and services.

norms.name: Fair Trade Law - Consumer Protection
norms.description: Prohibits unfair competition and deceptive practices. False advertising restrictions. FTC (Fair Trade Commission) enforcement. Affects product claims and marketing.

norms.name: Electromagnetic Compatibility - General Requirements
norms.description: General EMC requirements for electronic equipment. Emission and immunity. Based on international standards. Used for BSMI EMC compliance.

norms.name: Information Technology Equipment - Safety (IEC 60950-1)
norms.description: Legacy safety standard for IT equipment. Being replaced by CNS 14336-1 (IEC 62368-1). Transition period. May still be valid for existing certifications.

norms.name: Taiwan Accreditation Foundation
norms.applies_to: Testing labs, certification bodies, inspection bodies
norms.description: National accreditation body. Accredits labs and certification bodies for BSMI/NCC testing and certification. ISO/IEC 17025, 17065, 17020 compliance. TAF accreditation widely required.

norms.name: Quality Management Systems (Taiwan Standard)
norms.description: Taiwan adoption of ISO 9001. Quality management system certification. TAF accredits certification bodies. Important for supplier qualification.

norms.name: Environmental Management Systems (Taiwan Standard)
norms.description: Taiwan adoption of ISO 14001. Environmental management system certification. Increasingly required for suppliers to major Taiwan corporations.

norms.name: Information Security Management Systems (Taiwan Standard)
norms.description: Taiwan adoption of ISO/IEC 27001. Information security management certification. Important for IT products, services, and government contracts.
